_header: Sith Thou hast born the King of Grace
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — six quatrains (abab) with refrain, ‘Ora pro nobis’ and burden: ‘To þe we make oure mone / Moder of crist alone’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Sith thou hast born the kyng of graceThatt sittith so highe in
                    trone…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Be oure confort then we the prayModere of crist
                    alone
CULEe112.Editions:
